reviews.text: Fast service, honest work, and good prices. I trust this workshop 100%

This workshop is one of the best I have visited. The staff is skilled, polite, and very professional. They diagnosed the problem quickly, kept me updated during the repair, and delivered the car earlier than promised. Clean workspace, reasonable pricing, and excellent customer care. Highly recommended.

Great people and great service! They checked my car properly, told me exactly what needed to be fixed, and didn’t try to add any unnecessary charges. The mechanic really knows his work. I’ll definitely come back for future services.

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
I had an excellent experience at this workshop. The team explained everything clearly, worked honestly, and finished the repair on time. Prices were fair, and my car feels like new again. Highly recommended for anyone looking for trustworthy service!

Excellent service, the car is perfection 100%. Quality +++, Responsible, ethical, prompt, delivered on the promise to fix the car same day. No delay, No drama, no headaches. They always answer the phone and respect the customer. VERY professional. Ali and his team are incredible!

At SSR I've always gotten great service. Very straightforward and they care about their customers. Honestly the only shop I trust taking my car to. Ishq and Sasi are my go to person for any Car questions and suggestions, 100% recommended.

I had some minor body work done last year to deal with some rust in a wheel well of my Acura. I went back this year to repair some minor parking garage damage. I was very satisfied with the work both times.
Ishtaq done my car safety service. He was super nice and he did great job

I recently had my front passenger window replaced, and I was thoroughly impressed with the quality of the workmanship. The cost was quite reasonable, and I would highly recommend this mechanic to anyone seeking quality work at a fair price.

I had an excellent experience here.  I cracked one of my rims and I brought my car to the shop to get it looked at. They had an opening and immediately went to work diagnosing and repairing my vehicle. I had forgotten to bring my new tires so Ish took his truck and drove me to get my new wheels from my house. They rebalanced and realigned both of my front wheels and set me up with a beautifully functioning, safe vehicle. Incredible customer service. I will be coming back.
The work is very reliable. I felt from my car work that the owner here is trustworthy and honest and the workers are very skilled.
The best shop with reasonable rates. Have changed all the tyres only for 50$. Definitely recommend this one
